products.name: Hitachi Brass Wire
products.description: Hitachi Brass Wire offers high quality and reliability, and addresses technical services and environmental issues to meet customers' needs. Their wide range of practical products satisfies various demands.
advantages: Most Suitable composition: As Pb (lead) and other impurities degrade the performance of electrode wires, we held them at the lowest level. We used closely examined materials and improved electric discharge properties.
High Dimensional Precision: Diamond dice with precisely controlled hole diameter ensures wire diameter and roundness tolerance are limited to 1µm.
Stable mechanical performance: Hardened material (H) managed with utmost care, showing stable tensile strength with little deviation.
High surface quality: Smooth surface free from flaws and irregularities with a special Hitachi treatment preventing brass powder generation.
High cutting speed: Optimized Zn (zinc) percentage improves discharging and allows higher cutting speed under same conditions.

products.name: Novotec 25L Ion Exchange Resin
products.description: Ion exchange resin developed for the deionization of water in wire erosion machines. The resin keeps the resistivity of the water to an appropriate level and therefore helps to ensure stable machining performance. NOVOTEC resin is a premium quality product specially developed for desalination of water in wire erosion machines. This keeps the process more stable and provides better service life than cheap imitation products.
advantages: Salination up to a conductivity of about one micro siemens / cm

products.name: Chmer EDM Filter
products.description: The Chmer EDM Filter is designed for industrial-grade EDM machines to ensure efficient filtration of dielectric fluids. Built with durable mild steel and microfiber medium, it enhances cutting performance and extends machine life.
advantages: Long service life with sturdy build

products.name: Riya ACCUCUT Brass Wire
products.description: ACCUCUT Brass Wire offers a high tensile strength range of 950-1100 N/mm², allowing faster cutting speeds and precise results. Its straight structure improves auto threading, and the surface treatment prevents brass powdering.
